queries.text:
Costs 
| summarize EffectiveCost = round(sum(EffectiveCost), 2) by Currency = BillingCurrency, BillingMonth = format_datetime(BillingPeriodStart, 'MM yyyy')

Costs
| summarize count_distinct(SubAccountId)

Costs
| where BillingPeriodStart >= startofmonth(now(), -1) and BillingPeriodStart < startofmonth(now())
| summarize TotalCount = count(), TotalCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by RegionName, BillingCurrency
| order by TotalCost desc 
| project RegionName, TotalCost = tostring(round(TotalCost, 2)), BillingCurrency, TotalCount

Costs
| where BillingPeriodStart >= startofmonth(now(), -1) and BillingPeriodStart < startofmonth(now())
| summarize TotalSpend = sum(EffectiveCost) by BillingAccountName, BillingCurrency
| order by TotalSpend desc
| project BillingAccountName, TotalSpend = round(TotalSpend, 2), BillingCurrency

Costs 
| summarize EffectiveCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by Currency = BillingCurrency, BillingMonth = format_datetime(BillingPeriodStart, 'MM yyyy')
| order by BillingMonth desc
| top 3 by BillingMonth
| order by BillingMonth asc

Costs 
| summarize EffectiveCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by Currency = BillingCurrency, BillingMonth = format_datetime(BillingPeriodStart, 'MM yyyy')
| order by BillingMonth asc

Costs 
| summarize EffectiveCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by ServiceCategory, bin(month=BillingPeriodStart, 1m)

Costs 
| summarize EffectiveCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by ServiceName, bin(month=BillingPeriodStart, 1m)

Costs 
| summarize EffectiveCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by RegionName, bin(month=BillingPeriodStart, 1m)

Costs 
| summarize EffectiveCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by ResourceName, bin(month=BillingPeriodStart, 1m)
| order  by EffectiveCost desc  
| top 10 by EffectiveCost

// Total number of Services

Costs
| summarize ServiceCount = count() by ServiceName
| summarize TotalServiceCount = sum(ServiceCount)

Costs 
| summarize TotalCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by ServiceCategory, bin(month=BillingPeriodStart, 1m)
| order by  ServiceCategory asc, month asc 
| project ServiceCategory, month, TotalCost
//| serialize PreviousMonthCost = prev(TotalCost,1)
| extend PreviousMonthCost = prev(TotalCost, 1)
//| extend PreviousMonthCost = prev(TotalCost, 1, ServiceCategory)
//| extend MoMChange = iff(isnull(PreviousMonthCost), 0, ((TotalCost - PreviousMonthCost) / PreviousMonthCost) * 100)
| extend MoMChange = (TotalCost - PreviousMonthCost)
| extend MoMChange_Percent = iff(isnull(PreviousMonthCost), 0, tolong(((TotalCost - PreviousMonthCost) / PreviousMonthCost) * 100))
| project ServiceCategory, month, TotalCost, PreviousMonthCost,MoMChange, MoMChange_Percent
| order by ServiceCategory asc,month asc

Costs
| where BillingPeriodStart >= startofmonth(now(), -4) and BillingPeriodStart < startofmonth(now())
| summarize EffectiveCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by BillingCurrency, BillingMonth = format_datetime(BillingPeriodStart, 'MM yyyy')
| order by BillingMonth asc
| extend PreviousMonthCost = prev(EffectiveCost, 1)
| extend PercentageChange = (EffectiveCost - PreviousMonthCost) * 100.0 / todouble(PreviousMonthCost)
| extend PercentageChange = strcat(tostring(round(PercentageChange, 2)), "%")
| project BillingMonth, BillingCurrency, EffectiveCost, PreviousMonthCost, PercentageChange
| where BillingMonth != format_datetime(startofmonth(now(), -4), 'MM yyyy')

Recommendations
| extend x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson=parse_json(x_RecommendationaExtendedProperties)
| extend monthlySavingsAmount=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.savingsAmount
| extend annualSavingsAmount=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.annualSavingsAmount
| extend savingsCurrency=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.savingsCurrency
| extend lookbackPeriod=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.lookbackPeriod
| extend scope=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.scope
| extend term=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.term
| extend commitment=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.commitment
| where RecommendationProblem contains "reserved" or RecommendationProblem contains "savings plan"
| project ['Subscription name']=SubAccountName, ['Subscription ID']=SubAccountId, ['Recommendation description']=RecommendationProblem, ['Scope']=scope, ['Monthly savings']=monthlySavingsAmount, ['Annual savings']=annualSavingsAmount, ['Currency']=savingsCurrency, ['Lookback period']=lookbackPeriod, ['Term']=term, ['Commitment amount']=commitment

Recommendations
| where RecommendationProblem contains "reserved" or RecommendationProblem contains "savings plan"
| summarize count() by tostring(RecommendationProblem)
| project ['Recommendation description']=RecommendationProblem, ['Quantity']=count_

// TODO: Should Adjustment costs be on List/ContractedCost?
Costs
| where not(BilledCost != 0 and EffectiveCost == 0 and ChargeCategory == 'Purchase')
| summarize 
    NegotiatedSavings = round(sum(ListCost) - sum(ContractedCost), 2),
    CommitmentSavings = round(sum(ContractedCost) - sum(EffectiveCost), 2),
    TotalDiscountSavings = round(sum(ListCost) - sum(EffectiveCost), 2)
    by BillingPeriodStart

Costs 
| summarize TotalCost = sum(EffectiveCost) by ServiceCategory, bin(Month=BillingPeriodStart, 1m)
| order by  ServiceCategory asc, Month asc 
| project ServiceCategory, Month, TotalCost
//| serialize PreviousMonthCost = prev(TotalCost,1)
| extend PreviousMonthCost = prev(TotalCost, 1)
| extend PreviousMonthCost = iff(isnull(PreviousMonthCost), 0, tolong(PreviousMonthCost))
//| extend PreviousMonthCost = prev(TotalCost, 1, ServiceCategory)
//| extend MoMChange = iff(isnull(PreviousMonthCost), 0, ((TotalCost - PreviousMonthCost) / PreviousMonthCost) * 100)
//| extend MoMChange = (TotalCost - PreviousMonthCost)
| extend MoMChange = iff(isnull(PreviousMonthCost), 0, tolong((TotalCost - PreviousMonthCost)))
| extend MoMChange_Percent = iff(isnull(PreviousMonthCost), 0, tolong(((TotalCost - PreviousMonthCost) / PreviousMonthCost) * 100))
| extend MoMChange_Percent = iff(isnull(MoMChange_Percent), 0, tolong(MoMChange_Percent))
| project ServiceCategory, Month, tolong(TotalCost), PreviousMonthCost,MoMChange, MoMChange_Percent
| order by ServiceCategory asc,Month asc

Costs
| where BillingPeriodStart >= startofmonth(now(), -12) and BillingPeriodStart < startofmonth(now())
| summarize TotalSpend = sum(EffectiveCost) by BillingAccountName, BillingCurrency, BillingMonth = format_datetime(BillingPeriodStart, 'MM yyyy')
| order by BillingAccountName, BillingMonth asc
| project BillingAccountName, BillingMonth, TotalSpend = round(TotalSpend, 2), BillingCurrency

Costs
| where BillingPeriodStart >= startofmonth(now(), -12) and BillingPeriodStart < startofmonth(now())
| summarize TotalSpend = sum(BilledCost) by BillingAccountName, BillingCurrency, BillingMonth = format_datetime(BillingPeriodStart, 'MM yyyy')
| order by BillingAccountName, BillingMonth asc
| project BillingAccountName, BillingMonth, TotalSpend = round(TotalSpend, 2), BillingCurrency

Recommendations
| where RecommendationCategory == 'Cost'
| where RecommendationProvider startswith "Microsoft"
| extend RecommendationProvider = tostring(split(RecommendationProvider, '.')[1])
| extend Recommendation = strcat(RecommendationProblem, ' (', RecommendationProvider, ')')
| summarize Quantity = count() by Recommendation
| order by Quantity

Recommendations
| where RecommendationCategory == 'Cost'
| where RecommendationProvider startswith "Microsoft"
| extend x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson=parse_json(x_RecommendationaExtendedProperties)
| extend annualSavingsAmount=toint(x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.annualSavingsAmount)
| extend savingsCurrency=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.savingsCurrency
| extend lookbackPeriod=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.lookbackPeriod
| extend scope=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.scope
| extend term=tostring(x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.term)
| extend commitment=x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.commitment
| extend SKU=tostring(x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.displaySKU)
| extend Qty=toint(x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.displayQty)
| extend Region=tostring(x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.region)
| where x_RecommendationaExtendedProperties contains "term" and x_RecommendationaExtendedProperties contains "scope" and x_RecommendationaExtendedProperties contains "annualSavingsAmount"
| summarize arg_max(annualSavingsAmount, *) by SubAccountId, RecommendationProblem, term, SKU, Region
| project ['Subscription name']=SubAccountName, ['Recommendation description']=RecommendationProblem, ['Scope']=scope, ['Annual savings']=annualSavingsAmount, ['Currency']=savingsCurrency, ['Term']=term, ['Hourly commitment (USD)']=commitment, SKU, Region, Qty
| order by ['Recommendation description'], SKU, Region, ['Annual savings']

let startOfDate = startofmonth(now(), -3);
let endOfDate = endofmonth(now(), -1);
Costs
| where ChargePeriodStart between (startOfDate..endOfDate)
| summarize ContractedCost = round(sum(ContractedCost), 2), YourCost = round(sum(EffectiveCost), 2), YourSavings = round(sum(ContractedCost) - sum(EffectiveCost), 2) by CommitmentDiscountName, CommitmentDiscountType, ProductType = iff(CommitmentDiscountType == 'Savings Plan', 'Compute', ServiceName)
| where YourSavings > 0 and ProductType != 'RoundingAdjustment'
| order by ProductType asc

Costs()
| where tolower(x_SkuMeterCategory) == "virtual machines" and iif(selectedRegion <> "", RegionName == selectedRegion, ResourceName <> "") and iif(selectedMeterSubCategory <> "", x_SkuMeterSubcategory == selectedMeterSubCategory, x_SkuMeterSubcategory <> "")
| extend PricingModel = iif(CommitmentDiscountType <> "", CommitmentDiscountType, x_PricingSubcategory)
| extend vCPUs=iif(todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs) <> "", todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs), todecimal(1))
| where iif(selectedPricingModel <> "", PricingModel == selectedPricingModel, PricingModel <> "")
| summarize CPUHours=sum(ConsumedQuantity*vCPUs) by PricingModel, Family=x_SkuMeterSubcategory, RegionName
| order by CPUHours desc

Costs()
| where tolower(x_SkuMeterCategory) == "virtual machines" and iif(selectedRegion <> "", RegionName == selectedRegion, ResourceName <> "") and iif(selectedMeterSubCategory <> "", x_SkuMeterSubcategory == selectedMeterSubCategory, x_SkuMeterSubcategory <> "")
| extend PricingModel = iif(CommitmentDiscountType <> "", CommitmentDiscountType, x_PricingSubcategory)
| extend vCPUs=iif(todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs) <> "", todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs), todecimal(1))
| where iif(selectedPricingModel <> "", PricingModel == selectedPricingModel, PricingModel <> "")
| summarize CPUHours=sum(ConsumedQuantity*vCPUs) by PricingModel, RegionName
| order by CPUHours desc

Costs()
| where tolower(x_SkuMeterCategory) == "virtual machines" and iif(selectedRegion <> "", RegionName == selectedRegion, ResourceName <> "") and iif(selectedMeterSubCategory <> "", x_SkuMeterSubcategory == selectedMeterSubCategory, x_SkuMeterSubcategory <> "")
| extend PricingModel = iif(CommitmentDiscountType <> "", CommitmentDiscountType, x_PricingSubcategory)
| extend vCPUs=iif(todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs) <> "", todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs), todecimal(1))
| where iif(selectedPricingModel <> "", PricingModel == selectedPricingModel, PricingModel <> "")
| summarize CPUHours=sum(ConsumedQuantity*vCPUs) by x_SkuMeterSubcategory
| order by CPUHours desc

let startOfDate = startofmonth(now(), -1);
let endOfDate = now();
let dt = 1d;
Costs
| where ChargePeriodStart between (startOfDate..endOfDate)
| make-series cost=sum(EffectiveCost) on ChargePeriodStart from startOfDate to endOfDate step dt by SubAccountId, ResourceType, ResourceId
| extend (Anomalies, AnomolyScore, ExpectedCost) = series_decompose_anomalies(cost, 1.5, -1, 'linefit')
| mv-expand cost to typeof(decimal), AnomolyScore to typeof(double), ChargePeriodStart to typeof(datetime), Anomalies to typeof(double), ExpectedCost to typeof(long)
| where Anomalies != 0 and (cost !=0 and ExpectedCost != 0)
| project-away SubAccountId
| sort by abs(AnomolyScore) desc

Costs()
| where tolower(x_SkuMeterCategory) == "virtual machines" and iif(selectedRegion <> "", RegionName == selectedRegion, ResourceName <> "") and iif(selectedMeterSubCategory <> "", x_SkuMeterSubcategory == selectedMeterSubCategory, x_SkuMeterSubcategory <> "")
| extend PricingModel = iif(CommitmentDiscountType <> "", CommitmentDiscountType, x_PricingSubcategory)
| extend vCPUs=iif(todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs) <> "", todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs), todecimal(1))
| where iif(selectedPricingModel <> "", PricingModel == selectedPricingModel, PricingModel <> "")
| summarize CPUHours=sum(ConsumedQuantity*vCPUs) by RegionName
| order by CPUHours desc

Costs()
| where tolower(x_SkuMeterCategory) == "virtual machines" and iif(selectedRegion <> "", RegionName == selectedRegion, ResourceName <> "") and iif(selectedMeterSubCategory <> "", x_SkuMeterSubcategory == selectedMeterSubCategory, x_SkuMeterSubcategory <> "")
| extend PricingModel = iif(CommitmentDiscountType <> "", CommitmentDiscountType, x_PricingSubcategory)
| extend vCPUs=iif(todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs) <> "", todecimal(parse_json(x_SkuDetails).VCPUs), todecimal(1))
| where iif(selectedPricingModel <> "", PricingModel == selectedPricingModel, PricingModel <> "")
| summarize CPUHours=sum(ConsumedQuantity*vCPUs) by PricingModel
| order by CPUHours desc

Recommendations
| where RecommendationCategory == 'Cost'
| where RecommendationProvider startswith "Microsoft"
| extend RecommendationProvider = tostring(split(RecommendationProvider, '.')[1])
| summarize count() by RecommendationProvider

Recommendations
| where RecommendationCategory == 'Cost'
| where RecommendationProvider startswith "Microsoft"
| extend x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson=parse_json(x_RecommendationaExtendedProperties)
| extend annualSavingsAmount=toint(x_RecommendationaExtendedPropertiesJson.annualSavingsAmount)
| where annualSavingsAmount > 0
| summarize ['Annual savings']=sum(annualSavingsAmount) by RecommendationProblem
| order by ['Annual savings']
